strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Garden Maintenance' metaphor to explain technical backend fixes makes them feel cozy and tangible. The visual of fixing irrigation (data flow) and securing items (committing images) aligns perfectly with the nature-tech fusion of the brand.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art title screen. A cute 8-bit bee character wearing a tiny construction hat and holding a wrench, standing next to a glowing lime green (#ecf874) pipe. Soft pastel lavender and mint gradient background. Chunky retro text at the top reads 'PATCH NOTES'. Warm lighting, nostalgic game vibe.
images.description: Intro slide establishing the theme of maintenance and stability.

images.prompt: Retro game inventory screen close-up in pixel art. A cursor hand is placing a glowing 'Image File' icon into a sturdy wooden chest labeled 'GitHub'. The chest is sitting on a stable lime green (#ecf874) platform. Soft sparkles around the chest indicating it is saved and secure. Pastel background. Cozy, satisfying UI aesthetic.
images.description: Visualizing the 'commit images to GitHub' fix as physically storing items for safekeeping/stability.

images.prompt: Pixel art scene of a mail-carrier bee dropping a physical photo onto a community notice board (representing Discord). The photo sticks perfectly. The board has lime green (#ecf874) borders. Surrounding the board are happy tiny pixel characters. Warm, soft lighting, feeling of successful delivery. No broken links.
images.description: Visualizing the 'Discord upload as attachment' fix as a successful physical delivery.

caption:

alt_text: A carousel of cozy pixel art images. 1) A bee with a wrench fixing a lime green pipe. 2) A retro game inventory screen storing an image file in a chest. 3) A bee delivering a photo to a notice board.
